name: Archiver Compressed File Archive
summary: Learn about .ARCHIVER files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To create an ARCHIVER file, drag and drop your audio or image file into the application. You can also select File â†’ Open..., navigate to your file, and click Open. After you open your file, select "Create Archive," choose "Archiver," specify your settings, and click "Finish."
To open an ARCHIVER file, double-click the file and select "Extract." From here, you can open the file or export your file or export it.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
